root: ^This is a strange girl you've hired.
^Anyway, I'll be busy doing some work right now. So do whatever you want.
^Mr.Nicholas, you should come with me around town!
^He just got out of the hospital. He shouldn't be moving around.
^I think this will be a great way to job his memories, don't think?
^Fine. You're free to go. Just don't get him into anything too straining.
